programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: Renegado Impiedoso, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Pardon Chato é um índio Apache mestiço que vive na linha entre duas culturas, balanceando a sua tribo com o encantamento que tem pelo mundo dos brancos.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Exército de 5 Homens, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Durante a revolução mexicana, um misterioso homem conhecido como - Dutchman, chama três velhos amigos para uma missão perigosíssima, talvez...até mesmo suicida!

programme.title: No Tempo das Diligências, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Um grupo de nove pessoas são obrigadas a embarcar em uma perigosa jornada em cima de carruagens através do Arizona, em um território indígena.

programme.title: Arizona Violento, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Quando John Stewart dá refúgio à namorada de Wick Campbell, Campbell se volta contra ele.

programme.title: Da Terra Nascem os Homens, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Após a morte de seu marido, Martha e sua filha Hilary decidem seguir o sonho do falecido: popularizar a raça de touros Hereford no Oeste Americano. Elas leiloam seu touro premiado para um fazendeiro inglês no Texas e partem em viagem rumo ao Oeste.

programme.title: A Pistola do Mal, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Gunfighter Lorn Warfield volta para casa após uma ausência de três anos. Lorn encontra seu rancho em ruínas. Seu vizinho, Owen Forbes, informa Lorn que seu rancho foi invadido pelos apaches que sequestraram sua esposa e dois filhos.

programme.title: Segredos Malignos, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto caminhava para casa depois de uma consulta obstétrica, Esther é brutalmente atacada e desfigurada por um agressor encapuzado.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Legado de Violência, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negócios perigosos e pessoas de mau caráter foge, um pai se vê em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.title: Segredos Malignos, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto caminhava para casa depois de uma consulta obstétrica, Esther é brutalmente atacada e desfigurada por um agressor encapuzado.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: Abraham Lincoln vs. Zombies, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto a Guerra Civil continua, o presidente Abraham Lincoln deve realizar uma tarefa ainda mais assustadora: Destruir os mortos-vivos confederados.

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da população americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo país em busca de um refúgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: A Múmia Ressurge, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma múmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a única maneira de escaparem é derrotar a múmia.

programme.title: O grupo conhece Gakusanjin e descobrem que Narak roubou uma pedra guardiã.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Grande Pista Para Derrotar Narak

programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 1)

programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 2)

programme.title: Hakudoshi está planejando tomar o lugar de Naraku. Ele rouba os fragmentos da Jóia Shikon de Kagome e seduz Kagura para trair Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Após curar suas feridas infligidas por Naraku, usando a alma de Midoriko, Kikyo encontra novamente Inuyasha e revela o segredo para destruir Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: É o dia do anual Exame de Promoção de Demônio Raposa. Miroku e seus amigos ficam presos nos testes. Shippo tira sarro de Inuyasha e sobe no ranking.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O ferreiro Toshu forjou uma lâmina de demônio usando uma das escamas de Ryujin, e a Dakki nasceu. Toda vez que Inuyasha tenta atacar, ele é prejudicado pela energia demoníaca.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga de Escamas de Dragão

programme.title: O Tetsusaiga atingiu o poder das escamas de dragão. A fim de poder usar rapidamente o poder demoníaco, Inuyasha não tem escolha a não ser passar por treinamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salvá-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausoléu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela também tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku está atrás do último fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refém.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa

programme.title: Kagome se forma no ensino médio e retorna à era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O coração de Inuyasha é devorado pelo veneno da Jóia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demoníaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escuridão em seu coração toma conta dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome são restaurados e a luz divina é revivida na Jóia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demônio apesar de ter um coração humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poço do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu último desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mãos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a última pessoa a obter a Jóia Shikon faz o único desejo correto, a jóia será purificada e desaparecerá inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos após ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai é acordado por uma garota do ensino médio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poço Come-Ossos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado

programme.title: Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnação da irmã mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrás da Joia de Quatro Almas

programme.title: Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jóia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois não se dão bem.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Volta Através do Poço Come-Ossos

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome está relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procurá-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O meio irmão de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo túmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro chega ao hotel em Singapura, mas Polnareff cai direto na armadilha de um usuário de Stand ao entrar no quarto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro começa a desconfiar que Kakyoin esteja possuído quando ele age de modo estranho e espanca brutalmente um ladrão em Singapura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff parte sozinho para vingar a irmã depois de ser atacado por um estranho Stand que só pode ser visto no reflexo de um espelho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 1

programme.title: Kakyoin tenta convencer Polnareff a fugir quando descobre que o aliado está enfrentando uma batalha perdida contra o Stand inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados atravessam um deserto em que o Sol nunca se põe e a temperatura aumenta a níveis insuportáveis.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin sonha com um parque de diversões onde se ouve o choro de um bebê. De volta ao mundo real, um bebê aparece como passageiro do avião em que está a equipe de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ninguém leva a preocupação de Kakyoin com o bebê a sério, mas a verdade logo vem à tona quando eles vão parar no mundo dos pesadelos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o pai de Avdol em uma ilha remota, mas o homem vive sozinho e não quer contato com ninguém. Polnareff descobre uma lâmpada estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand que surge da lâmpada atende ao terceiro desejo de Polnareff e ressuscita Avdol, mas o ex-defunto só quer saber de acabar com o autor do desejo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.title: Avdol cria um plano para se defender do Stand, mas o inimigo está atento. Iggy, que deveria ajudar o grupo, cai no sono bem no meio da luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.title: Kakyoin e Avdol procuram tratamento médico enquanto os outros homens entram em um café e são recebidos por dois irmãos usuários de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Khnum do Ongo e o Thoth do Bongo

programme.title: Um jovem chamado Chaka tem uma mudança súbita de personalidade depois de encontrar uma espada misteriosa. Jotaro e seu grupo viajam para o Cairo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff percebe que a espada de Chaka é um Stand quando é atacado por seu barbeiro. O problema é que a espada está mais poderosa desde a última luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados chegam à cidade de Luxor, e Joseph leva um choque ao tocar uma estranha pedra com uma tomada elétrica.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Avdol ficam presos um ao outro por causa do Stand inimigo. Quando eles finalmente conseguem se separar, acabam prendendo os pés em um trilho de trem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff, numa versão criança, precisa enfrentar o usuário de Stand Alessi contando apenas com seu minúsculo Stand. Na hora H, ele recorre a uma solução impensável.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo finalmente chegam ao Cairo. Eles encontram um homem que diz saber onde fica a mansão de DIO, mas ele se recusa a dar esta informação de graça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro demonstra suas habilidades com o Stand antes de começar uma partida de pôquer com D’Arby como aviso para que ninguém trapaceie.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse chega ao aeroporto do Cairo com ordens para matar Jotaro e seus aliados. Dentro da mala, ele traz um novo e relutante parceiro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Avdol procura informações sobre a mansão de DIO no Cairo. Iggy enfrenta dois cães ameaçadores durante um passeio pela cidade.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 1

programme.title: Iggy foge para o rio após se ferir gravemente na luta contra Petto Shoppu, mas não dá sinais de que vai desistir.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O guardião do inferno Pet Shop – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo são recebidos na porta da mansão de DIO por um mordomo chamado D’Arby, que alega ser irmão mais novo de D’Arby, o apostador.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin perde a alma em um jogo de corrida contra D’Arby. Joseph escolhe um jogo que é a especialidade do mordomo e leva uma bronca de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Adventure)
programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: O Doador de Memórias, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A impressionante história de Jonas, um jovem que vive num mundo sem cor mas aparentemente perfeito, e de harmoniosa conformidade. No entanto, Jonas começa a passar mais tempo com o Doador, o único guardião de todas as memórias da comunidade.

programme.title: O Dragão de Natal, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Ayden, uma jovem mulher na Europa medieval, é a única pessoa que pode salvar o Natal depois de um duende moribundo lhe entregar um cristal mágico. Ayden e outros órfãos devem escapar às criaturas de fantasia para devolver o feitiço ao norte.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.desc: Arn foi criado com o objetivo de ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário.

programme.title: O Doador de Memórias, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A impressionante história de Jonas, um jovem que vive num mundo sem cor mas aparentemente perfeito, e de harmoniosa conformidade. No entanto, Jonas começa a passar mais tempo com o Doador, o único guardião de todas as memórias da comunidade.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam após seu último trabalho no Sudeste Asiático.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: The Bellboy, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lewis stars as Stanley, a non-speaking, bumbling bellhop at the ritzy Fontainebleau Hotel in Florida’s Miami Beach. Guests may come and guests may go, but Stanley is on duty day after day at the posh resort, encountering all sorts of catastrophes.

programme.title: Cinderfella, (1960, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jerry Lewis plays Cinderfella – a hard-working and honest lad mistreated by his wicked stepmother and his two boorish stepbrothers. But miracles do happen when his Fairy Godfather transforms the klutzy fella into an eligible, handsome bachelor.

programme.title: The Ladies Man, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: After being jilted by his gal, Herbert swears off romance and is determined to live his life as a confirmed bachelor. However, he then finds employment at a Hollywood boardinghouse for women, and the female residents go wild over the new help!

programme.title: The Errand Boy, (1961, Comedy)
programme.desc: Morty S. Tashman, under the guise of studio mail clerk, is to roam the lot and then report back to the boss with any questionable or dishonest activities. But virtually all of the shenanigans and escapades Morty uncovers are ones of his own doing!

programme.title: Who's Minding The Store?, (1963, Comedy)
programme.desc: An incompetent young man is given a job in a department store by his girlfriend's mother, who hopes to put an end to their romance.

programme.title: The Disorderly Orderly, (1964, Screwball)
programme.desc: Poor Jerome Littlefield. He wants to be a doctor, but he's incredibly squeamish. So he settles for the job of an orderly at the Whitestone Sanitarium, a career move that’s guaranteed to keep the patients in stitches!

programme.title: Boeing-Boeing, (1965, Comedy)
programme.desc: Boeing Boeing follows the lives of journalist Bernard and his friend Robert. Bernard is juggling romances with three different stewardesses but when Robert comes in for a visit and the airline carriers increase flights to Paris the comedy ensues!

programme.title: His Girl Friday, (1939, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

programme.title: The 39 Steps, (1935, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.

programme.title: The Lady Vanishes, (1938, Thriller)
programme.desc: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)

programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Hannibal Rising, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young Hannibal moves in with his aunt and begins plotting revenge after his baby sister is killed during World War II. Based on Thomas Harris' novel.

programme.title: Hinata is kidnapped by Suzumebachi and others from the Kamizuru Clan.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Officer Trudge in hot pursuit, Yusei looks to rev his game up before the long arm of the law grabs a hold of him for good!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.desc: With the Fortune Cup Finale one win away, Yusei and Akiza get set to battle it out as Director Goodwin anxiously awaits the final Signer to reveal their Mark of the Dragon.

programme.title: Usopp runs into trouble in his battle with Treebol, and flashback sheds light on how a young Kyros made the shocking transition from murderer to one of King Riku's most trusted men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!

programme.title: In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo's chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!

programme.title: Toys all across Dressrosa regain their human form, a flood of forgotten memories return, and Kyros launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend is Back! Kyros' All-out Blow!

programme.title: Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo's clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!

programme.title: Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his newfound followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo's defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army - Sabo!

programme.title: The mystery of Doflamingo's return from the dead is revealed! But there isn't much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!

programme.title: As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The 500 Million Berry Man! Target: Usoland!

programme.title: Doflamingo and Fujitora's agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace, Fujitora stands in his way!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!

programme.title: Robin, Usopp, the Tontattas and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo's deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin'emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!

programme.title: With Luffy & the others recovering from Pica's attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica's giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steady Progress! Luffy’s Army vs. Pica!

programme.title: Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law's handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Shocking Confession! Law's Soulful Vow!

programme.title: Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through Doflamingo's guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!

programme.title: Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!

programme.title: Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Great Escape! Luffy's Tide-turning Elephant Gun!

programme.title: The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks towards a unified plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A United Front! Luffy's Breakthrough to the Victory!

programme.title: Hidden far underground, Kin'emon finds his old friend Kanjuro whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!

programme.title: The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Señor Pink.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro's Deadly Attack!

programme.title: Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Little People's Princess! Captive Mansherry!

programme.title: Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius' exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!

programme.title: Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Risking Their Lives! Luffy is the Trump Card for Victory!

programme.title: Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!

programme.title: Usopp uses Viola's Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster, and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp's ammunition has been specially designed for this situation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!

programme.title: The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy's own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Señor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law's Ultimate Stratagem!

programme.title: All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!

programme.title: With Fujitora's stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law's traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sad Memories! Law, the Boy from the White Town!

programme.title: Law's attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he's accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon's mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law's life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy's Stormy Past!

programme.title: Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon's actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon's Journey of Life!

programme.title: Corazon's double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Time is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!

programme.title: The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon's hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!

programme.title: Doflamingo & his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law's whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape, even if that means sacrificing his own life. A chain of lucky coincidences allows the plan to be set into motion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man's Final Fight!

programme.title: Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it's Law's revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Be Free! Law's Injection Shot Blasts!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family—and unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Western)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Bells Of Capistrano, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: A feud between rodeo companies accelerates when both want Gene Autry, as a crowd-drawing added attraction. This film features Gene singing five hits, including "In Old Capistrano" and "Forgive Me."

programme.title: Call Of The Canyon, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry leads cattlemen in rebellion when a packing company rep cheats them. A gal’s future depends on the company's radio spots for her show! It gets exciting when the owner appears incognito.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Screwball)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: Saving Silverman, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: Darren, Wayne and J.D. have been inseparable since grade school. However, their friendship is put to the test when Darren meets Judith, a young lady with the looks of an angel and the demeanor of the devil himself.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: School of Rock, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band and looking for work, he becomes a substitute teacher and turns his class into rock and rollers.

programme.title: Saving Silverman, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: Darren, Wayne and J.D. have been inseparable since grade school. However, their friendship is put to the test when Darren meets Judith, a young lady with the looks of an angel and the demeanor of the devil himself.

programme.title: Daryl and Beth find shelter while another group has a realization about their own protection; Sasha, Bob and Maggie clash over a search mission.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: After finding and establishing a new shelter, members of the group consider things returning to how they were before; Carol must make a difficult choice.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl struggles to fit in with his new group while Glenn finds Maggie's messages and races to catch up to her.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Many paths collide on each group's travels; Rick remembers the past and faces sheer brutality; the group struggles to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Join Daryl, Michonne, the Clarks and others from the world of The Walking Dead. Enjoy cast interviews, BTS moments, and more!
programme.desc: The Walking Dead Universe

programme.title: The true motives of the Terminans come to light when Rick and the others end up in a vulnerable situation.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick leads a risky mission for a possible small reward when the supplies run low and the group's mistrust of people grows.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others find themselves pitted against a nasty group but may have a plan to gain the upper hand.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Another group of survivors is introduced, and although things appear safe and nice, there is a bit of a dark side.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group must contend with a new set of issues while out on a mission, and must push through to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Stakes are high when members of the group must go on a heroic rescue mission in a previously known location.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group is spread thin with some members holding down the church and the others on a rescue mission.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: New enemies disregard rules and morals; although Rick wants to find a peaceful agreement, the enemies seem to prefer a more violent resolution.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: After facing all of the recent trials, a slight detour may offer the solution that the group has been seeking.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: What Happened and What's Going On

programme.title: The group feels beaten after living life on the road, but must continue to trudge along in spite of the changes they have incurred.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: After withstanding a spectacular storm, Rick and the others meet what appears to be a friendly person, but find themselves mistrustful.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group has a difficult time molding to a new lifestyle, forcing them to consider whether they can be the people they once were.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
